writer.name: 马科斯·卡内瓦莱 Marcos Carnevale

director.name: 弗洛拉·马丁内斯 Flora Martínez

introduction: Itzia, a deaf woman, claims she can listen to a peculiar music that always comes from the same cardinal point: the south. Her town questions her sanity, but she is determined to prove them wrong and affirm her sanity. Leaving the cacao farm behind, she embarks on a journey to find the music's source. A magical realism film, Itzia, Tango and Cacaois a poignant narrative of a brave woman's determination and self-discovery drawn by the most powerful force that humanity knows: love.Winner of Best Film and Best Actress Awards at European Cinematography Awards 2023Winner of Best Sound and Best Music Awards at Power Screen Film Festival London 2023
